content.title: $300K in One Week – The Future is Bright
content.creator:
Chillshark
March 25, 2025
content.content:
One week in, and Chillshark has already crossed $300,000 pledged on Kickstarter! The support from this community has been incredible, and we couldn’t be more excited for what’s ahead.
This is just the beginning. Every single one of y'all is helping us bring Chillshark to life, and we’re beyond grateful.

content.title: 250k! Thank you all so much.
content.creator:
Nathan BlueCollaborator
March 21, 2025
content.content: 250K Reached! Chillshark continues to surpass expectations. Thank you to our backers for making this possible. The momentum doesn’t stop here.

content.title: 100k in 2 Hours!
content.creator:
Chillshark
March 19, 2025
content.content: We just hit $100,000 on Kickstarter in 2 hours, and we’re at a loss for words. This community is something special.

content.title: What a start! We are fully funded in 7 minutes!
content.creator:
Chillshark
March 18, 2025
content.content:
In just 7 minutes, Chillshark was fully funded on Kickstarter. We’re blown away, humbled, and beyond grateful for this community that believed in us from day one.

This isn’t about hitting a goal—it’s about proving that cold plunging should be effortless, accessible, and built for real life. And because of YOU, we’re making that a reality.

Thank you for your support, your belief, and your excitement. This is just the beginning. Let’s keep pushing forward
